_instructions.purpose: Contact page template with comprehensive contact information and forms
_instructions.usage: Generate contact page that makes it easy for customers to reach the company
_instructions.customization: Contact methods can be customized based on company preferences and target audience

meta.title: [PROMPT] Generate SEO title: 'Contact {Company} - {Industry} Experts | Get Quote Today' (max 60 chars)
meta.description: [PROMPT] Write meta description encouraging contact, mentioning response time and expertise (max 160 chars)

hero.title: [PROMPT] Generate contact hero title ('Contact Us', 'Get In Touch', 'Reach Our Experts')
hero.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create welcoming subtitle encouraging contact
hero.description: [PROMPT] Write description about readiness to help and discuss requirements
hero.backgroundImage: [PROMPT] Professional contact/office image from Unsplash (search: office, contact, professional, business meeting)

contactInfo.title: [PROMPT] Generate contact info title ('Contact Information', 'Reach Us', 'Multiple Ways to Connect')
contactInfo.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle about accessibility and responsiveness

items.title: [PROMPT] Address section title ('Our Location', 'Visit Us', 'Head Office')
items.content: [PROMPT] Use same address as in config.json - ensure consistency

items.title: [PROMPT] Phone section title ('Phone', 'Call Us', 'Direct Line')
items.content: [PROMPT] Use same phone as in config.json - ensure consistency

items.title: [PROMPT] Email section title ('Email', 'Send Message', 'Email Us')
items.content: [PROMPT] Use same email as in config.json - ensure consistency

items: [PROMPT] Add optional additional contact methods: WhatsApp, LinkedIn, specific department contacts, emergency contact, etc.

contactForm.title: [PROMPT] Generate form title ('Send Message', 'Get In Touch', 'Contact Form')
contactForm.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle about response time and helpfulness (e.g., 'Fill out the form and we'll get back to you within {X} hours')
